item.title: This pothole in the middle of the road had got much worse.., 20th January
item.description:

item.title: Multiple potholes in failed road repair, 20th January
item.description:
The old repair is failing again with multiple potholes on the outside of the road on Pittville Circus. These are increasingly dangerous to cyclists as there are no options to avoid them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Pittville Circus, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
